pr_title: EQL: case sensitivity aware integration testing

timeline.message:
EQL: Add case-sensitive and insensitive integration tests

(cherry picked from commit 28a3f55e9bf7e9374fcac9efe77fda82d4bf006d)

EQL: Remove whitespace from EqlSearchRequest.java

(cherry picked from commit 125f19d04b1a585cc16b21bb15c30659ee564b68)

EQL: Update EqlSpec.equals

(cherry picked from commit bbc7215332ff1b0ef3174534ca4197bc8e993c54)

EQL: Unbox Boolean for testing

(cherry picked from commit 48d3b72a7a48306c66f70a6c487e3c8a0d009ac0)

EQL: Make case_sensitive/case_insensitive required

(cherry picked from commit 254b5c3744cec2fe7f79da948ac2f9402fc9131a)

EQL: Update queries blacklist

(cherry picked from commit 28d9a76442f4a25d9137cd9b75e6ef632200f74a)

EQL: Remove unnecessary blacklists

(cherry picked from commit 545ab4a570883276044332cf58defb0ffe4bfd3c)

EQL: Unbox EqlSearchRequest.isCaseSensitive

(cherry picked from commit b8d16d3ffd6b55e454a6af7d7101dd7bfdaa8f68)

EQL: Lint/nitpick feedback

(cherry picked from commit 0e742deb1a7b2c09701debfc17e7dc8f7423ad3e)

Add DataLoader

Rewrite case sensitivity settings:
NULL -> run both case sensitive and insensitive tests
TRUE -> run case sensitive test only
FALSE -> run case insensitive test only
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch into case-sensitive-tests

timeline.bodyText: These are incorrectly formatted (as is the rest of the group under it) - the sequence has 4 items not 2 on a line.
timeline.author: costin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -391,8 +691,12 @@ sequence
   [process where opcode == 2] by process_path
   [file where event_subtype_full == "file_delete_event"] by file_path
 | head 4
-| tail 2'''
-expected_event_ids  = [67, 68, 69, 70, 72, 73, 74, 75]
+| tail 2
+'''
+expected_event_ids  = [67, 68,
+                       69, 70,
+                       72, 73,
+                       74, 75]

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch into case-sensitive-tests
Address reviews and exclude more tests
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch into case-sensitive-tests
Allow even more tests to run
